title: Riot Support
body: I requested a ticket to help me with a RP card that I was given to me for Christmas. I got one reply saying that someone will help me. Still have no one helping me. I heard that the Riot Support team was quick and always helping people, but I think that's a lie now. So much for purchasing RP when you can't even use it.

replies.body:
Hey friend, I'm sorry to hear you had issues with your Prepaid RP Card. I'm sure that wasn't a great way to spend the holiday. Speaking of holidays, they've had us pretty slammed with support requests, so responses are a bit longer than what's considered *normal*. While it will take a bit longer than normal, I'm confident one of our billing specialists will reach back out just as soon as possible.

Please let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
